contents.text: Welcome to IGN Entertainment, where over 154 million fans enjoy sharp opinions and groundbreaking gaming and entertainment content.
For support options, including account management and technical assistance, please press 1.
For account or subscription questions, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our subscriber services team.

navigationGoals: Update the payment method on my IGN subscription
I need to apply my veteran discount to my active IGN subscription.
I need to upgrade my Premium subscription plan and update my billing credentials.
I need help renewing my IGN subscription and updating my payment details.
I’d like to apply for a student discount to my IGN Pro subscription.

contents.text: For technical support with our website or app, please press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Fix the IGN app crashing when I try to log in
I need help fixing an error when logging into the IGN app on my phone.
I’m seeing a memory-leak crash in the IGN app when switching tabs and need debugging support.
I’m having trouble logging into the IGN app and need assistance.
I can’t play videos on the IGN app and need technical help.

contents.text: For advertising, sponsorship, and partnership inquiries, please press 2.
For advertising and sponsorship opportunities, please press 1.
Please hold as we connect you to our sales and marketing team.

navigationGoals: Get pricing details for placing a banner ad on IGN
I’m calling on behalf of a veterans charity to discuss sponsorship packages with IGN.
I want to explore programmatic ad integration and RTB targeting for my game’s sponsorship campaign.
I’d like to learn about advertising opportunities for a community newsletter aimed at seniors.
I’m organizing a university physics club event and want to discuss sponsorship opportunities.

contents.text: For media, press, and partnership inquiries, please press 2.
Please hold while we forward your call to our public relations team.

navigationGoals: Request a press kit for an upcoming article
I want to request a media interview with IGN about veteran gaming community coverage.
I’d like to schedule a press interview with IGN’s editorial team about our upcoming launch.
I’m writing an article for my local paper and want to speak with someone about IGN’s content for a press feature.
I’m a student journalist seeking press credentials and a media kit for covering IGN’s game-physics content.
